'''Rowan''' was a young [[Pre-Númenóreans|Southlander]] of [[Tirharad]] in the [[Mordor|Southlands]] of [[Middle-earth]]. Rowan was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]] where he is portrayed by [[Ian Blackburn]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt9788618/fullcredits|articlename=Full Cast & Crew|dated=|website=IMDB|accessed=28 July 2022}}</ref>
